casebody.data:
AURORA LOAN SERVICES, LLC, Plaintiff
v.
Pedro L. PEREZ, His Heirs, Devisees and Personal Representatives and His Successors in Right, Title and Interest, Mrs. Perez, Wife of Pedro L. Perez, Her Heirs, Devisees, and Personal Representatives, Defendants-Movants,
and
Citibank and Federal Savings Bank, Defendants. M-882/883 September Term 2017
079808 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 23, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-883) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-882) is denied.
